data.title: McCarthy And Wahlberg Tie The Knot In Chicago
data.meta_description: It is the second marriage for both the actress and the former New Kids On The Block star, who began dating last year.
data.text:
Pop star-turned-reality television star Donnie Wahlberg has married actress Jenny McCarthy in Chicago.

The couple announced their engagement in April and revealed plans to marry over the Labor Day weekend.

McCarthy, a former co-host of the talk show, The View, and Wahlberg, part of 1980s boy band New Kids On The Block, held their ceremony in the Chicago suburb of St Charles, WGN-TV said.

Wahlberg tweeted: "Every tweet. Every thought. Every wish. Every kind word. Every kind gesture. Means so much. Thank you! #loveeternal."

It's the second marriage for both 45-year-old Wahlberg and 41-year-old McCarthy.

Donnie's brother, the Transformers star Mark Wahlberg, was not at the ceremony, but posted a message and video on Facebook saying he and his family "wish we could be there".

"Congratulations from all of us," it said.

Donnie and Mark currently co-star in the reality television show, Wahlburgers, which focuses on brother Paul's Massachusetts restaurant.

McCarthy was in a relationship with the actor Jim Carrey from 2005 to 2010.
